code: import{API_BASE_URL}from"./config";/* CONTACT FORM */export const sendContact=async data=>{const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/contact"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(data)});return res.json();};/* GET PORTFOLIO */export const getPortfolio=async()=>{const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/portfolio"));return res.json();};/* ADMIN LOGIN */export const adminLogin=async credentials=>{const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/login"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(credentials)});return res.json();};/* ADD PORTFOLIO (ADMIN) */export const addPortfolio=async(data,token)=>{const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/portfolio"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:token},body:JSON.stringify(data)});return res.json();};
